resources.string: This app needs access to your sms to read all your great messages.

"Your pulse oximeter can be found faster if you press the button to keep it on."
Scan QR code on the back of the scale

Systolic pressure:
Maximum value of the blood pressure as a result of the contraction of the systemic ventricle.

Diastolic pressure:
Minimum value of the blood pressure as a result of relaxation of the systemic ventricle.
"Hold the button for 8 seconds to reset the pulse oximeter."
"Turn off Bluetooth in your mobile device settings then turn on again"

Press the START/STOP button on the blood pressure monitor until the LED light appears. Charge it if no light appears.
Please record the random 6 digit number on the tracker, then enter the last 2 digits of this number during the pairing process.

This feature indicates the amount of bone (bone mineral level, calcium, or other minerals) in the body. Research has shown that exercise and the development of muscle tissue are related to stronger and healthier bones.
"Only one Activity Tracker is allowed per account, please check the MAC address on the back of the Activity Tracker you wish to pair with."

Click on the device titled BP XXXXXX to pair.
Voice feature is only available in English and French. Choosing any other language will disable this feature.

Take pill and take my Blood Pressure.
Position the cuff 1/2‚Äù (2cm) above your elbow joint.
Secure the cuff on your arm leaving enough space to fit one finger between the cuff and arm.
No data available of last 365 days
Apply the cuff following the UP/DOWN signs.
By registering an iHealth account, you have read and agreed with iHealth\'s Terms of Use and Privacy Policies.
Please connect to WiFi network in your mobile device settings.
Go to your phone settings and turn on Bluetooth.
Is your scale successfully setting the Wifi connection?

This feature indicates the weight of muscle in your body. The muscle mass displayed includes the skeletal muscles, smooth muscles [such as cardiac and digestive muscles] and the water contained in these muscles. Muscles play an important role as they act as an engine in consuming energy. As your muscle mass increases, your energy consumption increases helping you reduce excess body fat levels and lose weight in a healthy way.

PI:\nPI is the Perfusion Index. PI values reflect the pulsating blood flow, which reflects the ability of perfusion. The larger the pulsation of blood flow is, the larger the ripple is, and thus a higher PI value.
Please enter the last two digits displayed on the tracker to pair.

Swim Mode is activated by default. Leaving it on will increase battery consumption. It is recommened to turn swim mode off if you don\'t plan to use it.

Sleep reminder wakes you up by a slight vibration tracker.

Total Body Water Percentage is the total amount of fluid in a person‚Äôs body expressed as a percentage of their total weight. Water plays a vital role in many of the body‚Äôs processes and is found in every cell, tissue and organ. Maintaining a healthy total body water percentage will ensure the body functions efficiently and will reduce the risk of developing associated health problems.
There is no data in your blood pressure monitor. Please try to measure blood pressure first.
Set swim goals to motivate yourself
There\'s already a tracker linked in your account.If you want to add a new tracker,please ‚ÄúReset‚Äù the old one first and then add again.
Apply the cuff to your wrist with the screen facing up and iHealth logo upright. Leave two fingers spacing between the cuff and the bottom of your palm.

Turn on the monitor by applying the cuff or press the "START/STOP" button. Adjust the height of your wrist, the monitor will detect your wrist position and the measurement will start ONLY when the correct position is detected. When the position is correct, press "START/STOP" button again to start measurement.
The password is not supported by the input comma
The High pressure value cannot be equal to or lower than the Low pressure value.

Body fat percentage is the amount of body fat as a proportion of your body weight. Reducing excess levels of body fat has shown to reduce the risk of certain conditions such as high blood pressure, heart disease, diabetes, and cancer.
This app needs access to your location and contacts to know where and who you are.

This device has a SpO2 measurement range of 70 - 100%. SpO2 levels lower than 70% may indicate device malfunction, user error, or an abnormal blood oxygen saturation level. Please consult with your doctor about your blood oxygen saturation level.
Incorrect information may cause account problems in the future

Tap on the right or left bottom corner of the scale,room temperature and humidity will display for a few seconds.

Pulse Wave:\nWithin each cardiac cycle, the cyclical pressure fluctuations, which caused by ventricular systolic and diastolic, make the arteryexpansion and retraction. The
regular beats caused by the expansion and retraction of artery are called pulse. Along blood vessel walls the spread of the forward wave is called pulse wave.

Visceral fat is the fat that is in the internal abdominal cavity, surrounding the vital organs in the abdominal area. Research shows that even if your weight and body fat remains constant, as you get older the distribution of fat changes and is more likely to shift to the trunk area especially post menopause.
Select the object of your request *:
the percentage of time lying down that you are actually sleeping
"Turn On BlueTooth to Allow \"iHealth\" to Connect to Accessories"

Lean Body Mass is a component of body composition, calculated by subtracting body fat weight from total body weight.The percentage of total body mass that is lean is usually not quoted ‚Äì it would typically be 60‚Äì90%. The Lean body mass (LBM) has been described as an index superior to total body weight for prescribing proper levels of medications and for assessing metabolic disorders, as body fat is less relevant for metabolism.

Please concern the following information before you move on:
when you choose to bind iHealth account to current account,
the history data will be merged into iHealth account, and usually it would take some time (the data merging process will be performed on cloud, and then, these history data will be pushed to your application when finished).
Furthermore, it happens that you have application settings (like your weight target) in both places, and in this situation you have to choose yourself which application settings,
namely settings related to your account, to be used after binding.
You should bind an iHealth Accout.
